92 static void MmwDemo_hwaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
93 {
94  /* Initialize the HWA */
95  HWA_init();
96 }
97 
108 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
109 {
110  int32_t errorCode;
111 
112  errorCode = EDMA_init(DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE);
113  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
114  {
115  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
116  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
117  return;
118  }
119 
120  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
121  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
122 }
123 
131 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
132 {
133  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_errorInfo = *errorInfo;
134  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
135 }
136 
144 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
145  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
146 {
147  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo = *errorInfo;
148  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
149 }

162 static void MmwDemo_hwaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, SOC_Handle socHandle)
163 {
164  int32_t errCode;
165 
166  /* Open the HWA Instance */
167  obj->hwaHandle = HWA_open(0, socHandle, &errCode);
168  if (obj->hwaHandle == NULL)
169  {
170  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
171  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
172  return;
173  }
174 }
175 
186 static void MmwDemo_hwaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
187 {
188  int32_t errCode;
189 
190  /* Close the HWA Instance */
191  errCode = HWA_close(obj->hwaHandle);
192  if (errCode != 0)
193  {
194  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
195  return;
196  }
197 }
198 
209 static void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
210 {
211  int32_t errCode;
212  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
213  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
214 
215  obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE] = EDMA_open(DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE,
216  &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
217 
218  if (obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE] == NULL)
219  {
220  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
221  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
222  return;
223  }
224 
225  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
226  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
227  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
228  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
229  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
230  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
231  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
232  if ((errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle[DPC_OBJDET_EDMA_INSTANCE], &errorConfig)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
233  {
234  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
235  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
236  return;
237  }
238 }
239 
250 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
251 {
252  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
253 }
254 
265 void MmwDemo_dataPathInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
266 {
267  memset(obj, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_DataPathObj));
268 
269  /* Initialize HWA */
270  MmwDemo_hwaInit(obj);
271 
272  /* Initialize EDMA */
273  MmwDemo_edmaInit(obj);
274 }
275 
286 void MmwDemo_dataPathOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
287 {
288  /*****************************************************************************
289  * Open HWA, EDMA drivers instances
290  *****************************************************************************/
291  MmwDemo_hwaOpen(obj, gMmwDssMCB.socHandle);
292  MmwDemo_edmaOpen(obj);
293 }
294 
305 void MmwDemo_dataPathClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
306 {
307  /* DPC close */
308  DPM_deinit(obj->objDetDpmHandle);
309 
310  /* Close HWA driver */
311  MmwDemo_hwaClose(obj);
312 
313  /* Close EDMA driver */
314  MmwDemo_edmaClose(obj);
315 }
